channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Photos and Files Contest Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Photos and Files Contest Gallery

item.title: CVE-2024-1487|2024-03-11T18:09:00.360Z -- Unknown -- Photos and Files Contest Gallery
item.description: The Photos and Files Contest Gallery WordPress plugin before 21.3.1 does not sanitize and escape some parameters, which could allow users with a role as low as author to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
